CRD_HalsinRomance.synopsis: Camp relationship dialog for Halsin after reaching Act 3. He may proposition you romantically, or remain platonic.
CRD_HalsinRomance.how_to_trigger: Camp night after hitting Act 3 and having had at least 2 flirt moments with Halsin. Ignores if you are in an existing relationship.

CRD_HalsinRomance_28.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_28.text: I never quite realised how burdened I was, until I met you. The threat of the shadow curse, the politics of the grove...

CRD_HalsinRomance_48.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_48.text: ...I was forgetting who I was, but you lifted the fog. Thank you.

CRD_HalsinRomance_24.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_24.text: You're too modest. I wager you don't even know how extraordinary you truly are. But I do.
CRD_HalsinRomance_24.context: NodeContext: Intense, smouldering, full of longing.

CRD_HalsinRomance_104.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_104.text: I have lived a very long time. I have taken many lovers. My heart does not stir lightly. But it does now.
CRD_HalsinRomance_104.context: NodeContext: Intense, smouldering, full of longing.

CRD_HalsinRomance_1.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_1.text: I want more than to fight at your side, or sit around the campfire with you. I want to lay with you under the stars and feel your skin against mine.

CRD_HalsinRomance_60.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_60.text: I think you feel the same way - why else would you have been so concerned about whether I had a lover before?
CRD_HalsinRomance_60.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the player engaged in some flirtation/enquiries about Halsin's love life in his default dialogue

CRD_HalsinRomance_92.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_92.text: I think you feel the same way - you saw to my needs here in camp with the care of a lover, not a host.

CRD_HalsinRomance_82.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_82.text: I think you feel the same way - you saw to my needs here in camp with the care of a lover, not a host.

CRD_HalsinRomance_80.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_80.text: I think you feel the same way - you saw to my needs here in camp with the care of a lover, not a host.

CRD_HalsinRomance_93.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_93.text: I think you feel the same way. Once the power of the shadow curse was broken, the connection was undeniable. We both felt it.
CRD_HalsinRomance_93.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the player engaged in some flirtation with Halsin after the curse was lifted (can occur in either SCE_Halsin or CAMP_Halsin)

CRD_HalsinRomance_12.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_12.text: I think you feel the same way. Do you remember the celebrations after you saved the grove? There was a connection.

CRD_HalsinRomance_2.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_2.text: But tell me I'm wrong, and the matter can rest. I do not wish to sour our friendship, but I have to know if it can be something more.

CRD_HalsinRomance_49.speaker: Player
CRD_HalsinRomance_49.text: I'd be lying if I said I wasn't interested - but I'm already in a relationship.

CRD_HalsinRomance_19.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_19.text: You have bonded with Wyll, body and soul. His scent lingers on your skin. If there is to be anything between us, it must be with his consent. And perhaps some day, his participation.

CRD_HalsinRomance_83.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_83.text: You have bonded with Shadowheart, body and soul. Her scent lingers on your skin. If there is to be anything between us, it must be with her consent. And perhaps some day, her participation.

CRD_HalsinRomance_65.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_65.text: You have bonded with Gale, body and soul. His scent lingers on your skin. If there is to be anything between us, it must be with his consent. And perhaps some day, his participation.

CRD_HalsinRomance_34.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_34.text: You have bonded with Lae'zel, body and soul. Her scent lingers on your skin. If there is to be anything between us, it must be with her consent. And perhaps some day, her participation.

CRD_HalsinRomance_119.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_119.text: You have bonded with Astarion, body and soul. His scent lingers on your skin. If there is to be anything between us, it must be with his consent. And perhaps some day, his participation.

CRD_HalsinRomance_4.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_4.text: You have bonded with Karlach, body and soul. Her scent lingers on your skin. If there is to be anything between us, it must be with her consent. And perhaps some day, her participation.

CRD_HalsinRomance_89.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_89.text: I understand. If that is where the matter ends, so be it.

CRD_HalsinRomance_88.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_88.text: But know that if you are open to it, I will not demand commitment of you. Your heart is your own - I just want to share in it.

CRD_HalsinRomance_73.speaker: Player
CRD_HalsinRomance_73.text: You just want to share? What do you mean?

CRD_HalsinRomance_55.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_55.text: Some treat their relationships like a walled garden - tidy, tamed, cut off from the world. That is their right, but it is not for me. I do as nature does, and let my heart run wild. Desire flourishes wherever it finds purchase.
CRD_HalsinRomance_55.context: NodeContext: Sincere. This is a core belief of his.

CRD_HalsinRomance_72.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_72.text: It has its place, but it is not for me. The wolf mates for life, but the bear roams free and partners as its instinct dictates.
CRD_HalsinRomance_72.context: NodeContext: Sincere. This is a core belief of his.

CRD_HalsinRomance_110.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_110.text: I need to stay true to my nature, and you to yours. Perhaps you are like me, or perhaps not.
CRD_HalsinRomance_110.context: NodeContext: 'This is who I am. I really hope you're into that'.

CRD_HalsinRomance_42.speaker: Player
CRD_HalsinRomance_42.text: I want you. Consider things ended between Wyll and I.

CRD_HalsinRomance_30.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_30.text: Are you sure you wish to end the affair so... coldly? Perhaps if you speak to him, he may show an open mind.

CRD_HalsinRomance_45.speaker: Player
CRD_HalsinRomance_45.text: No. I've made up my mind. Do you still want this?

CRD_HalsinRomance_37.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_37.text: I... I do. I want this. I want you.

CRD_HalsinRomance_115.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_115.text: Now? Now you must rest. For the moment that engine of yours is fixed, I doubt you'll be getting very much sleep at all.

CRD_HalsinRomance_27.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_27.text: When the others are sleeping, we'll slip away together. And we won't get much sleep.

CRD_HalsinRomance_50.speaker: Player
CRD_HalsinRomance_50.text: I will speak with my current lover.

CRD_HalsinRomance_9.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_9.text: Take your time. I'll be waiting.

CRD_HalsinRomance_123.speaker: Player
CRD_HalsinRomance_123.text: I want you. Consider things ended between Shadowheart and I.

CRD_HalsinRomance_113.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_113.text: Are you sure you wish to end the affair so... coldly? Perhaps if you speak to her, she may show an open mind.

CRD_HalsinRomance_11.speaker: Player
CRD_HalsinRomance_11.text: I want you. Consider things ended between Gale and I.

CRD_HalsinRomance_97.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_97.text: Are you sure you wish to end the affair so... coldly? Perhaps if you speak to him, he may show an open mind.

CRD_HalsinRomance_122.speaker: Player
CRD_HalsinRomance_122.text: I want you. Consider things ended between Lae'zel and I.

CRD_HalsinRomance_120.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_120.text: Are you sure you wish to end the affair so... coldly? Perhaps if you speak to her, she may show an open mind.

CRD_HalsinRomance_96.speaker: Player
CRD_HalsinRomance_96.text: I want you. Consider things ended between Astarion and I.

CRD_HalsinRomance_41.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_41.text: Are you sure you wish to end the affair so... coldly? Perhaps if you speak to him, he may show an open mind.

CRD_HalsinRomance_100.speaker: Player
CRD_HalsinRomance_100.text: I want you. Consider things ended between Karlach and I.

CRD_HalsinRomance_29.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_29.text: Are you sure you wish to end the affair so... coldly? Perhaps if you speak to her, she may show an open mind.

CRD_HalsinRomance_23.speaker: Player
CRD_HalsinRomance_23.text: I want you. Consider my other relationship a thing of the past.

CRD_HalsinRomance_31.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_31.text: Are you sure you wish to end the affair so... coldly? Perhaps if you asked, you may find your lover has an open mind.

CRD_HalsinRomance_111.speaker: Player
CRD_HalsinRomance_111.text: I'm sorry - I'm in a relationship. I don't want to jeopardise it.

CRD_HalsinRomance_116.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_116.text: I understand, and I still cherish our relationship.

CRD_HalsinRomance_109.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_109.text: Still... I could not have forgiven myself had I not taken the plunge. Better to have tried and failed.
CRD_HalsinRomance_109.context: NodeContext: A little wistful. He's glad he took his shot, but would have preferred a different outcome.

CRD_HalsinRomance_74.speaker: Player
CRD_HalsinRomance_74.text: You're not wrong. Far from it.

CRD_HalsinRomance_69.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_69.text: I was concerned perhaps my imagination was playing tricks on me - my stomach was in knots like some lovelorn ninety-year-old.
CRD_HalsinRomance_69.context: CinematicNodeContext: Relieved smile.NodeContext: Relieved smile

CRD_HalsinRomance_67.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_67.text: If we do this, I need you to understand exactly what I do not ask of you:

CRD_HalsinRomance_52.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_52.text: I will not ask you to dedicate yourself to me. I roam as nature wills me to, and your heart remains your own. I just wish to share in it.

CRD_HalsinRomance_79.speaker: Player
CRD_HalsinRomance_79.text: You can share in my heart. And a lot more besides.

CRD_HalsinRomance_70.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_70.text: The feeling is more than mutual. Now: you must rest. And in the morning, we must get that engine of yours fixed. The moment I am able to touch you will be... memorable. For us both, I hope.

CRD_HalsinRomance_108.speaker: Player
CRD_HalsinRomance_108.text: I don't think we share the same nature. This isn't to be, I'm sorry.

CRD_HalsinRomance_98.speaker: Player
CRD_HalsinRomance_98.text: I'm sorry, I've changed my mind. We shouldn't do this.

CRD_HalsinRomance_17.speaker: Player
CRD_HalsinRomance_17.text: I'm afraid I just don't see you that way.

CRD_HalsinRomance_59.speaker: Player
CRD_HalsinRomance_59.text: If I wanted to rut with half a tonne of dumb muscle, I'd seduce a deep rothé.

CRD_HalsinRomance_25.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_25.text: A simple 'no' would have sufficed. I will trouble you with the matter no more.
CRD_HalsinRomance_25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Halsin looks crestfallenNodeContext: Wounded. His romantic overture has been brutally shot down

CRD_HalsinRomance_54.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_54.text: I think you feel the same way. The connection is... palpable.

CRD_HalsinRomance_13.speaker: Player
CRD_HalsinRomance_13.text: Many lovers? Perhaps your heart stirs more easily than you think.

CRD_HalsinRomance_44.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_44.text: Like I said, I've lived a long time, travelled far and wide. I've lain with elf maidens under the boughs of oaks. I've had a Nelanther pirate claw my back and cry my name until he was hoarse.
CRD_HalsinRomance_44.context: NodeContext: Without shame. He's lived a long time and has amassed more than a few notches on the bedpost

CRD_HalsinRomance_57.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_57.text: And I've been to the Underdark. Many times.
CRD_HalsinRomance_57.context: CinematicNodeContext: Big grin on 'many times'. Thinking fondly of past trysts.NodeContext: Big grin on 'many times'. Thinking fondly of past trysts.

CRD_HalsinRomance_117.speaker: Player
CRD_HalsinRomance_117.text: I thought you were bound to nature.

CRD_HalsinRomance_14.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_14.text: I still have hot blood in my veins. Nature gifted us our desires, and the means to act on them. But we muddied its beautiful simplicity with rules, social strictures... clothes.
CRD_HalsinRomance_14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Glances down at his own clothing with playful disdain on 'clothes'NodeContext: Playful disdain on 'clothes'

CRD_HalsinRomance_103.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_103.text: So, I am not bound to nature. I am unbound in nature.

CRD_HalsinRomance_26.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_26.text: Truly? I was sure we had a connection - you seemed more than a little curious about my current love life, for one.
CRD_HalsinRomance_26.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the player flirted with Halsin in Halsin_InParty

CRD_HalsinRomance_106.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_106.text: Truly? I thought you felt the same as I did - you saw to my needs here in camp with the care of a lover, not a host.
CRD_HalsinRomance_106.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the player flirted with Halsin in SCE_Halsin or CAMP_Halsin2 (before completing Lifting the Curse)

CRD_HalsinRomance_47.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_47.text: Truly? I thought you felt the same as I did - you saw to my needs here in camp with the care of a lover, not a host.
CRD_HalsinRomance_47.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the player flirted with Halsin in SCE_Halsin or CAMP_Halsin2 (before completing Lifting the Curse)

CRD_HalsinRomance_64.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_64.text: Truly? I thought you felt the same as I did - you saw to my needs here in camp with the care of a lover, not a host.
CRD_HalsinRomance_64.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the player flirted with Halsin in SCE_Halsin or CAMP_Halsin2 (before completing Lifting the Curse)

CRD_HalsinRomance_35.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_35.text: Truly? I was sure you felt the same way. Once the power of the shadow curse was broken, the connection was undeniable.
CRD_HalsinRomance_35.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the player flirted with Halsin in SCE_Halsin or CAMP_Halsin2 (after completing Lifting the Curse)

CRD_HalsinRomance_15.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_15.text: Truly? I was sure there was a connection, ever since we celebrated after you saved the grove.
CRD_HalsinRomance_15.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the player flirted with Halsin during CAMP_GoblinHuntCelebration_Halsin

CRD_HalsinRomance_101.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_101.text: But I respect your choice, if that's how you truly feel. Your friendship remains precious to me.

CRD_HalsinRomance_58.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_58.text: Truly? I thought you felt the same way as me. There was a connection, I was sure.

CRD_HalsinRomance_20.speaker: Player
CRD_HalsinRomance_20.text: I had my reasons for helping. You're a useful ally.

CRD_HalsinRomance_78.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_78.text: I want to be more than that to you. I have lived a very long time. I have taken many lovers. My heart does not stir lightly. But it does now.
CRD_HalsinRomance_78.context: NodeContext: Intense, smouldering, full of longing.

CRD_HalsinRomance_85.speaker: Player
CRD_HalsinRomance_85.text: So the fog's lifted - what have you discovered?

CRD_HalsinRomance_107.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_107.text: You. I discovered you. I have lived a very long time. I have taken many lovers. My heart does not stir lightly. But it does now.
CRD_HalsinRomance_107.context: NodeContext: Intense, smouldering, full of longing.

CRD_HalsinRomance_39.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_39.context: NodeContext: Intense, smouldering, full of longing.

CRD_HalsinRomance_66.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_66.text: It allowed me to see you. Truly see you. I have lived a very long time. I have taken many lovers. My heart does not stir lightly. But it does now.
CRD_HalsinRomance_66.context: NodeContext: Intense, smouldering, full of longing.

CRD_HalsinRomance_61.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_61.text: I already knew I had found a strong ally in you - but now I see I have been blessed with a true friend also.

CRD_HalsinRomance_40.speaker: Player
CRD_HalsinRomance_40.text: I'm glad, Halsin. I feel the same way.

CRD_HalsinRomance_33.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_33.text: I thought you might, but it still warms my heart to hear you say it.

CRD_HalsinRomance_18.speaker: Player
CRD_HalsinRomance_18.text: Honestly, I just needed someone strong enough to carry around all my gear.

CRD_HalsinRomance_6.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_6.text: Ha! I am honoured to be your beast of burden, then.

CRD_HalsinRomance_68.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_68.text: I did not wish for another day to end without telling you how I felt, and now I have done so. Rest well, and thank you once again.

CRD_HalsinRomance_86.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_86.text: I see... well, perhaps not all friendships are destined to be balanced and reciprocal. But I remain eternally grateful for having met you, all the same. Rest well.

CRD_HalsinRomance_5.speaker: Player
CRD_HalsinRomance_5.text: Did I have a choice? You basically invited yourself along.

CRD_HalsinRomance_62.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_62.text: Ha! I suppose I did, didn't I? I was so focused on helping Thaniel that my sense of decorum was neglected.

CRD_HalsinRomance_76.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_76.text: I shall endeavour to be more tactful when trying to make friends in future.

CRD_HalsinRomance_46.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_46.text: I believe so. Perhaps in another life, we would have felt something more stir between us... but that was not meant to be.

CRD_HalsinRomance_84.speaker: Halsin
CRD_HalsinRomance_84.text: The bond we share remains deeply precious to me, all the same.
